verses.verse: How is the <S%H2091>gold<s%> become <S%H6004>dim<s%>! how is the <S%H2896>most<s%> pure <S%H3800>gold<s%> <S%H8132>changed<s%>! The <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> are poured <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H2351>street<s%>.

The <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, <S%H5537>comparable<s%> to fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>, How are they <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H5035>pitchers<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H3335>potter<s%>!

The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the sucking <S%H3243>child<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> to the roof of his <S%H2441>mouth<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst<s%>: The young <S%H5768>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and no man breaketh it unto <S%H6566>them<s%>.

They that did <S%H398>feed<s%> <S%H4574>delicately<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>: They that were brought <S%H539>up<s%> in <S%H8438>scarlet<s%> <S%H2263>embrace<s%> <S%H830>dunghills<s%>.

For the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1431>greater<s%> than the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, That was <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> as in a <S%H7281>moment<s%>, and no <S%H3027>hands<s%> were laid upon <S%H2342>her<s%>.

Her <S%H5139>nobles<s%> were <S%H2141>purer<s%> than <S%H7950>snow<s%>, they were <S%H6705>whiter<s%> than <S%H2461>milk<s%>; They were more <S%H119>ruddy<s%> in <S%H6106>body<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies<s%>, their <S%H1508>polishing<s%> was as of <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>.

Their <S%H8389>visage<s%> is <S%H2821>blacker<s%> than a <S%H7815>coal<s%>; They are not <S%H5234>known<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>: Their <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H6821>cleaveth<s%> to their <S%H6106>bones<s%>; it is <S%H3001>withered<s%>, it is become like a <S%H6086>stick<s%>.

They that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> are <S%H2896>better<s%> than they that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger<s%>; For <S%H1992>these<s%> pine <S%H2100>away<s%>, <S%H1856>stricken<s%> <S%H8570>through<s%>, for want of the fruits of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7362>pitiful<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> have <S%H1310>boiled<s%> their own <S%H3206>children<s%>; They were their <S%H1262>food<s%> in the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, he hath poured <S%H8210>out<s%> his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>; And he hath <S%H3341>kindled<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, which hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> the foundations <S%H3247>thereof<s%>.

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H3427>not<s%>, neither all the inhabitants of the <S%H8398>world<s%>, That the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> and the <S%H341>enemy<s%> would <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

It is because of the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of her <S%H3548>priests<s%>, That have <S%H8210>shed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>her<s%>.

They <S%H5128>wander<s%> as <S%H5787>blind<s%> men in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, they are <S%H1351>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, So that men cannot3201, Obadiah8 <S%H5060>touch<s%> their <S%H3830>garments<s%>.

Depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H7121>ye<s%>, they cried unto <S%H2931>them<s%>, Unclean! <S%H5493>depart<s%>, <S%H5493>depart<s%>, <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H5132>not<s%>! When they fled away and <S%H5128>wandered<s%>, men <S%H559>said<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, They shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> sojourn <S%H1481>here<s%>.

The <S%H6440>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H2505>scattered<s%> <S%H3254>them<s%>; He will no more <S%H5027>regard<s%> <S%H5375>them<s%>: They respected not the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, they <S%H2603>favored<s%> not the <S%H2205>elders<s%>.

Our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> do yet <S%H3615>fail<s%> in looking for our <S%H1892>vain<s%> <S%H5833>help<s%>: In our <S%H6836>watching<s%> we have <S%H6822>watched<s%> for a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that could not <S%H3467>save<s%>.

They <S%H6679>hunt<s%> our <S%H6806>steps<s%>, so that we cannot <S%H3212>go<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets<s%>: Our <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H7126>near<s%>, our <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>; for our <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>.

Our <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> were <S%H7031>swifter<s%> than the <S%H5404>eagles<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: They <S%H1814>chased<s%> us upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, they laid <S%H693>wait<s%> for us in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

The <S%H7307>breath<s%> of our <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, was <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their <S%H7825>pits<s%>; Of whom we <S%H559>said<s%>, Under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz<s%>: The <S%H3563>cup<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through unto thee <S%H7937>also<s%>; thou shalt be drunken, and shalt make thyself <S%H6168>naked<s%>.

The punishment of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H8552>accomplished<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; He will no <S%H3254>more<s%> carry thee away into <S%H1540>captivity<s%>: He will <S%H6485>visit<s%> thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>; he will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
